comments.body: Yes that is the idea. But if I do that now I will have to change everything at once. I am trying to split it into small chunks so reviewing is simpler.
But the newly introduced methods could already have the arguments in the right order, right?
Sure that is correct. Let me fix it.
@mihaimaruseac since you approved this. Do you want me to fix them in a subsequent PR or on this one?
